item.title: 巴西总统卢拉表示，如果谈判不能尽快取得进展，他将再次致电特朗普
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周二表示，如果两国之间的会谈在巴西本月主办的联合国气候大会 COP30 结束前仍无进展，他将再次致电美国总统唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Tuesday he will call his U.S. counterpart Donald Trump again if talks between their countries do not progress by the end of COP30, the United Nations climate conference Brazil is hosting this month.】

item.title: 美国银行监管机构希望确保大银行废除 "去银行化 "政策
item.description: 美国一位资深银行监管者周二表示，他希望确保大型银行摒弃以前可能导致某些行业或客户 "去银行化 "的政策。【原文：A senior U.S. bank regulator said Tuesday that he is looking to ensure that large banks have abandoned previous policies that may have contributed to "debanking" of certain industries or clients.】

item.title: 独家报道致客户的信显示，Nexperia无法确定 "是否以及何时 "向中国部门发送芯片
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 在致客户的一封信中表示，由于正在研究中国是否会放宽对全球供应链的出口管制，该公司无法透露何时恢复从其位于中国东莞的工厂发货，也无法保证发货质量。【原文：Dutch chipmaker Nexperia cannot say when deliveries from its site in Dongguan, China, will resume or guarantee quality of shipments, according to a letter to customers, as it looks into whether China will ease export controls weighing on global supply chains.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定，"智能橱窗 "制造商 View 前首席财务官必须面对美国证券交易委员会的起诉
item.description: 联邦法官裁定，View 公司前首席财务官必须面对美国证券交易委员会的指控，即他因疏忽而允许这家 "智能窗户 "制造商低报更换有缺陷窗户的成本。【原文：The former chief financial officer of View must face U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission claims he negligently allowed the maker of "smart windows" to understate the cost of replacing defective windows, a federal judge ruled.】

item.title: IHeartMedia 股价因有关 Netflix 授权谈判的报道而创下两年新高
item.description: 本周二，iHeartMedia 的股价创下两年多来的新高，因为彭博新闻社报道称 Netflix 正在洽谈授权这家广播和播客公司发行视频播客。【原文：Shares of iHeartMedia hit their highest in more than two years on Tuesday after Bloomberg News reported that Netflix was in talks to license video podcasts distributed by the radio and podcasting firm.】

item.title: 关税动荡刺激经纪需求，物流公司 Expeditors 公布乐观业绩
item.description: 本周二，全球货运代理公司 Expeditors International of Washington 公布的第三季度利润和收入均高于华尔街预期，主要原因是空运量强劲以及对其报关服务的需求增加。【原文：Global freight forwarder Expeditors International of Washington reported third-quarter profit and revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, driven by strong airfreight volumes and increased demand for its customs brokerage services.】

item.title: 维多利亚的秘密面临来自 Brett Blundy 的 BBRC 的新压力，要求更换董事会
item.description: 内衣制造商维多利亚的秘密的大股东 BBRC International 周二要求罢免董事长唐娜-詹姆斯（Donna James）的职务，并要求为其创始人布雷特-布兰迪（Brett Blundy）提供一个董事会席位。【原文：Lingerie maker Victoria's Secret's major shareholder, BBRC International, on Tuesday called for the removal of Chair Donna James and requested a board seat for its founder Brett Blundy.】

item.title: 欧盟认为有时间和空间找到内克佩里亚解决方案，并避免最坏情况发生
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，它欢迎行业迹象表明中国已与欧盟公司接触，以恢复部分芯片的流通，从而防止出现最坏的情况，并为找到持久的解决方案创造时间和空间。【原文：The European Commission said on Tuesday it welcomed industry indications that China had engaged with EU companies to restore partial flow of chips, preventing a worst-case scenario and creating time and space to find a lasting solution.】

item.title: 竞购战升温，诺和诺德、辉瑞出价更高
item.description: 肥胖症药物开发商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）和辉瑞（Pfizer）周二表示，已经修改了对美塞拉（Metsera）的出价。【原文：Novo Nordisk and Pfizer have revised their bids for Metsera , the obesity drug developer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟立法者就特朗普关税协议的日落条款和条件展开辩论
item.description: 欧洲议会周二开始就是否将欧盟与美国的关税协议作为华盛顿让步的条件和时间限制进行辩论，这可能会重燃与特朗普政府的贸易紧张关系。【原文：The European Parliament began debating on Tuesday whether to make the EU-U.S. tariff deal conditional on concessions from Washington and limited in time, which could reignite trade tensions with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 工业集装箱公司 TriMas 将以 14.5 亿美元的价格剥离航空航天部门
item.description: 工业集装箱制造商 TriMas 公司周二表示，将以 14.5 亿美元的价格向投资公司 Tinicum 的关联公司出售其航空航天部门。【原文：TriMas Corp is selling its aerospace segment to an affiliate of investment firm Tinicum for $1.45 billion, the industrial container maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法拉利将在美国销售的部分车型的价格涨幅限制在 5%以内
item.description: 法拉利发言人告诉路透社，在达成降低欧洲产品进口关税的协议后，法拉利已将其在美国销售的部分车型的价格涨幅缩减至最多 5%。【原文：Ferrari has trimmed price increases on some of the models it sells in the U.S. to a maximum of 5% following a deal to reduce the import tariff on European products, a spokesman told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司与新日本制铁公司共同推出 110 亿美元投资计划
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp）周二表示，该公司正与新日铁公司（Nippon Steel）共同启动一项多年发展计划，目标是在美国投入约 140 亿美元的发展资金，其中 110 亿美元将在 2028 年底前投入。【原文：United States Steel Corp said on Tuesday it is launching a multi-year growth plan with Nippon Steel that targets approximately $14 billion of U.S. growth capital, with $11 billion to be invested by the end of 2028.】

item.title: 赫兹第三季度扭亏为盈，业绩大幅增长
item.description: 本周二，赫兹全球公司（Hertz Global）时隔近两年实现第三季度盈利，该公司依靠二手车销售和更新的租车车队拉动了需求，股价在盘前交易中上涨了 27%。【原文：Hertz Global swung to a third-quarter profit after nearly two years on Tuesday, as the company relied on used vehicle sales and a newer fleet of rental cars to drive demand, sending its shares up 27% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 英国 Starling 公司与加拿大 Tangerine 公司签订软件协议，计划招聘 100 名员工
item.description: 斯塔琳集团（Starling Group）周二表示，随着这家总部位于英国的银行继续进行全球扩张，斯塔琳集团已签署了一项为期 10 年的协议，为新斯科舍银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）旗下的加拿大数字银行 Tangerine 升级核心软件。【原文：Starling Group has signed a 10-year agreement to upgrade core software at Tangerine, a Canadian digital bank owned by Bank of Nova Scotia , as the British-based bank continues its global expansion, Starling said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 金默里奇呼吁对 Coterra 进行彻底改革，称 2021 年的合并是失败的
item.description: 激进投资者 Kimmeridge 周二呼吁对 Coterra Energy 的领导层和战略进行彻底改革，称卡博特石油天然气公司和 Cimarex Energy 于 2021 年合并成立的公司未能实现价值，使其交易价格低于同行。【原文：Activist investor Kimmeridge on Tuesday called for an overhaul of leadership and strategy at Coterra Energy , saying the 2021 merger of Cabot Oil & Gas and Cimarex Energy to form the company has failed to deliver value and left it trading at a discount to its peer.】

item.title: 莱茵金属公司首席执行官告诉路透社：正在接近数十亿欧元的弹药合同
item.description: 德国防务巨头莱茵金属公司首席执行官 Armin Papperger 周二在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司已进入数十亿欧元弹药供应合同谈判的最后阶段。【原文：German defence giant Rheinmetall is in the final stages of negotiating a multi-billion-euro ammunitions supply contract, CEO Armin Papperger told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度法庭解除 WhatsApp 数据共享禁令，维持 Meta 罚款判决
item.description: 印度一家上诉法庭周二撤销了反垄断监督机构对 Meta 旗下 WhatsApp 公司与其他 Meta 实体共享用户数据做广告的五年禁令，标志着这家美国科技巨头取得了部分胜利，但维持了罚款判决。【原文：An Indian appeals tribunal on Tuesday set aside an antitrust watchdog's five-year ban on Meta-owned WhatsApp sharing user data with other Meta entities for advertising, marking a partial win for the U.S. tech major, but upheld a fine.】

item.title: 因 IT 解决方案需求强劲，CDW 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周二，IT 解决方案提供商 CDW 的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是企业客户增加了技术预算，并开始采用人工智能云技术。【原文：IT solutions provider CDW beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as enterprise customers increased tech budgets and embraced artificial intelligence cloud adoption.】

item.title: 贝森特：随着技术的发展，英伟达的高端芯片可能会被出售
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，随着技术的发展和更好芯片的制造，他可以设想将 Nvidia 先进的 Blackwell 芯片出售给中国和其他国家。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he could envision a scenario where Nvidia's advanced Blackwell chips can be sold to China and other countries as technology evolves and better chips are made.】

item.title: 智利 Codelco 公司 9 个月税前利润为 6.07 亿美元，产量增加
item.description: 智利科德尔科公司（Codelco）（COBRE.UL）是世界上最大的铜生产商，该公司周二公布，在截至 9 月份的 9 个月里，该公司实现税前利润 6.069 亿美元，略低于去年同期的 6.122 亿美元。【原文：Chile's Codelco (COBRE.UL), the world's largest copper producer, on Tuesday posted a pre-tax profit of $606.9 million in the nine months to September, slightly below the $612.2 million reported in the same period last year.】

item.title: 马丁玛丽埃塔公司因基础设施需求持续增长而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 马丁玛丽埃塔材料公司（Martin Marietta Materials）周二公布第三季度利润增长，主要得益于基础设施需求和价格上涨。【原文：Martin Marietta Materials reported a higher third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by infrastructure demand and stronger pricing.】

item.title: 由于电费上涨，Exelon 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 美国公用事业公司埃克塞隆（Exelon）周二公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于较高的电价和较低的风暴恢复成本。【原文：U.S. utility Exelon surpassed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by higher rates for electricity and lower storm recovery costs.】

item.title: 商户解决方案部门业绩强劲，Global Payments 季度利润上升
item.description: 周二，支付技术公司 Global Payments 公布第三季度利润增长，主要得益于其商户解决方案业务的强劲表现。【原文：Payment technology company Global Payments reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by a robust performance in its merchant solutions business.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Broadridge 的利润因投资者交流部门的强势而翻番
item.description: 本周二，金融科技公司 Broadridge Financial 的第一季度利润增长了一倍多，这得益于其投资者沟通解决方案的强劲增长。【原文：Fintech firm Broadridge Financial's first-quarter profit more than doubled on Tuesday, helped by strong growth in its investor communications solutions.】

item.title: 斯坦利黑戴克因生产成本上升下调年度利润预期
item.description: 电动工具制造商斯坦利-布莱克-戴克公司周二下调了年度利润预期，理由是生产成本上升，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌近 4%。【原文：Power tools maker Stanley Black & Decker lowered its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, citing higher production costs, sending its shares down nearly 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 牙科和医疗设备销售强劲，Henry Schein上调年度预期
item.description: 医疗设备分销商亨利-申（Henry Schein）周二公布的第三季度业绩超出华尔街预期，牙科和医疗部门的强劲销售推动其上调了全年盈利预期。【原文：Medical equipment distributor Henry Schein raised its annual profit forecast after beating Wall Street estimates for third-quarter results on Tuesday, driven by strong sales in its dental and medical units.】

item.title: 挪威暂停财富基金的道德撤资计划
item.description: 挪威议会周二投票赞成其 2.1 万亿美元的世界最大主权财富基金暂停道德撤资，同时更新该基金的道德准则。【原文：Norway's parliament on Tuesday voted in favour of pausing ethical divestments by its $2.1 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, while it updates the fund's ethical guidelines.】

item.title: 加拿大购物网站 Shopify 预测假日季度收入乐观
item.description: 本周二，Shopify 预计第四季度营收将实现强劲增长，这表明随着零售商为最重要的假日购物季做准备，电子商务公司的需求将出现恢复性增长。【原文：Shopify , projected strong fourth-quarter revenue growth on Tuesday, signaling resilient demand at the e-commerce company as retailers gear up for the all-important holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 实验室设备需求强劲，沃特世公司上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 实验室设备制造商沃特世公司（Waters Corp）周二上调了全年利润预期，此前该公司第三季度利润超出预期，原因是生物技术客户对其用于药物开发和研究的工具需求增加。【原文：Lab equipment maker Waters Corp raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, after beating third-quarter profit estimates on improved demand from biotech clients for its tools used in drug development and research.】
